author: m.kalinin
content: May we have an invitation to the call or announce it 12 hours before next time?

author: gichiba
content:
Hey all, so I tried something new and used machine translation for this call. Let me know if you think it's a bad idea. The benefit is that the transcript has timestamps, so you can get the video link if you really want to review what was said, and of course by outsourcing to neural networks outside of my own skull I saved quite a bit of time and headache meticulously transcribing 90 minutes of conversation... 

https://notes.ethereum.org/@afhGjrKfTKmksTOtqhB9RQ/HkIjiJKUL

author: gichiba
content: I did still run through it once to make sure technical terms are correctly transcribed

author: pipermerriam
content: A quick scan looks like it's "good enough".  üëç

author: pipermerriam
content: Anyone who needs the exact wording can watch the video

author: gichiba
content: and for what it's worth, the previous transcrips are much cleaner precisely because they don't do exact wording. People talk really funny when it's transcribed word for word...
